text: Lochhead is a surname shared by several notable people, among them being: * Alex Lochhead (born 1866), Scottish footballer * Andy Lochhead, footballer * Archie Lochhead, Scottish-American banker *Arthur Lochhead (1897–1966), Scottish footballer * David Lochhead, theologian * Doug Lochhead, football manager * Kenneth Lochhead, painter * Liz Lochhead, poet *Matty Lochhead (1884–1964), Scottish footballer * Richard Lochhead, politician
title: Lochhead
